description.title: **SPANISH **Low cost and no cost solutions to save energy and water for your family!
description.body2: ∙ **SPANISH **Investigate your electronics to find the off switch or button.
description.body3: ∙ **SPANISH **Make sure you and your family turn off all electronics when you leave a room.
description.body4: ∙ **SPANISH **Some energy guzzling electronics to keep an eye on are TV, Video Came Console, Radio, Lights
description.body5: ∙ **SPANISH **You can save water by turning off the tap when you don't need it
description.body6: ∙ **SPANISH **Turn of the tap when you brush your teeth
description.body7: ∙ **SPANISH **Turn off the tap while soaping up your hands
description.body8: ∙ **SPANISH **Turn off the tap while washing dishes until it's time to rinse them
description.body9: **SPANISH **Here are some tips on how to stay comfortable in your home during the winter:
description.body10: ∙ **SPANISH **Wear socks or slippers to keep your feet warm
description.body11: ∙ **SPANISH **Wear multiple layeres of clothing for extra protection against the cold
description.body13: **SPANISH **Put your detective skills to the test by searching your home for hidden air leaks!
description.body14: **SPANISH **∙ Use your hand to check for cold winds around doors, windonws, and under sinks
description.body15: **SPANISH **If your light bulbs get hot or don't look liek spirals they are wasting energy!
description.body16: **SPANISH **Might be time to get new energy saving lights
